name: The Well
description:
Just a little thing for the Timdred Jam, whos theme was "Point of no Return"
This is my second attempt at creating a game for this jam :P (only had 6 hours or so D:)

Controls
WASD - Movement
Mouse - Look
LMB - Attack
RMB - Heal
Space - Jump

My best was 1,790, comment yours :D
